title: How does this happen, what am I doing wrong
body:
I went 8/2 in my promos, got placed in Gold 3. I'm ok with that considering I dropped from Plat last season.

Win every game up to promos, skip gold 2.

And now, I cant for the life of me win games in Gold 1. I'm playing better, generally win my lane but every game I play every other lane loses. I'm not saying that the loss is their fault, but how is it that every game I get the losing laners. Duoing only makes it more difficult because I get matched with silvers vs plats.

replies.body: your ranks and elo mean nothing the matches aren't made by an algorithm they are made by fallible human hand, lift scumbag

If you are able to hang around gold2, then when all the other players elo's round out properly you should be getting more competent teams. Just stick to it and wait till your teammates are actually around your elo and then you should be able to climb a bit easier.
And just got dropped to Gold 2. Also worth noting my win/loss was 16-3 at one stage. It's now something like 19-16 haha. Maybe my luck ran out
